definition[0]: a payment or share that is pro rata is calculated according to how much of something is used, how much work is done etc
example[0]: Fees are calculated on a pro rata basis.
definition[1]: a pro rata payment or share in something is calculated according to exactly how much of something is used, how much work is done etc
example[1]: The residents here pay more than their pro rata share of taxes.
example[2]: Fees for longer or shorter courses are calculated on a pro rata basis.
